backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with numerous data types for sessions, documents, messages, files, images, and storage integration via mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for preview/edit mode and file marker rendering.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend source files describing their responsibilities within the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables defining light/dark theme color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point initializing theme mode early and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, session restoration, logout, and routing to Lobby or Session.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: Error boundary component that catches app errors and offers reload or local data clearing options.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChannelChat: Chat view handling message input, roll commands, image upload, and posting messages with auto-scroll.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders individual chat messages with avatars, timestamps, roll badges, and optional image attachments.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCom: Displays document comments, allows adding and deleting comments, and manages permissions and error states.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCon: Parses content for file markers and renders text, inline images, or download blocks for attached files.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentEdi: Document editor supporting content editing, saving, file uploads, image insertion, and preview mode.
frontend/src/components/docs/ImageUpload: Modal dialog for selecting, validating, titling, and uploading an image file.
frontend/src/components/docs/PlayerDocum: Editor UI for viewing, editing, saving, and managing visibility, files, and images within a player document.
frontend/src/components/profile/Avatar.t: Renders a user avatar with fallback initials and optional image handling with error recovery.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Manages uploading, removing, and displaying a user's profile picture with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/session/ChannelM: Dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting channels within a session, including form validation and API calls.
frontend/src/components/session/Document: Dialogs for creating, renaming, deleting, and locking/unlocking documents in a session.
frontend/src/components/session/HostSess: Provides UI to export and import session data, including file parsing, confirmation, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/session/MembersC: UI dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting member channels with mutation handlers and validation.
frontend/src/components/session/PlayerDo: Components for creating, renaming, deleting, and managing visibility of player documents using related mutations.
Displays a list of player-owned documents and provides a dialog for creating new ones and selecting existing ones.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionD: Handles listing, creating, renaming, and deleting session-wide documents with modal dialogs and mutation logic.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionS: Renders the session sidebar showing host channels and member channels with controls to create and manage them.
frontend/src/components/settings/PreLobb: UI component for managing user preferences like theme, background image, nickname, and template import/reset with stateful success/error handling.
frontend/src/config/polling.ts: Defines polling interval constants for various data fetch operations.
Provides a React context for loading, saving, updating, and resetting user preferences including theme mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentComments.t: React Query hooks to list, add, update, and delete document comments through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentFiles.ts: React Query hooks for listing file references, fetching a specific file reference, and uploading document files.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentImages.ts: Hooks for listing document images and adding images to GM or player documents with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook for managing identity state and login flow.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerDocuments.ts: Hooks to list, fetch, create, rename, delete, edit, and update visibility of player documents.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts: Custom hook that runs a callback on a timed interval when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferences.ts: Re-exports the usePreferences hook from the preferences context.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionData.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and poll session details, channels, members’ channels, and messages, plus mutations for managing members’ channels.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionDocuments.t: Implements queries and mutations for listing, retrieving, creating, editing, renaming, and deleting session documents via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Fetches a user’s display name from their profile or falls back to a shortened principal string.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to load, update, and manage user profiles, including caller profile and profile picture removal.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light and dark theme CSS variables with a warm green accent palette.
frontend/src/lib/clearLocalAppData.ts: Clears specific localStorage keys and all sessionStorage entries with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/documentFileMarkers.ts: Handles creation, parsing, insertion, and removal of inline file markers embedded in document content.
frontend/src/lib/documentImageMarkers.ts: Manages creation, parsing, insertion, and removal of inline image markers within document text.
frontend/src/lib/preferencesStorage.ts: Loads, saves, and resets user UI preferences stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/rollCommand.ts: Validates basic dice roll command patterns and returns simple validation results.
frontend/src/lib/sessionExportFile.ts: Creates, downloads, and parses JSON session export files with version validation.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Stores, loads, and clears session context data in localStorage.
Saves, loads, clears, and validates session template data in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats timestamps into readable time or date-time strings depending on recency.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: UI for hosting or joining sessions, managing form state, applying templates, and invoking actor API to create or join a session.
frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx: Main session UI that loads channels, documents, and messages, and switches between chat, player documents, and session documents.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and UI theming.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, requirements, and planned preview-mode functionality for document rendering.
